Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Expands the definition of veteran to include members of the commissioned corps of the national oceanic and atmospheric administration and the United States public health service
Summary: Expands the definition of veteran to include members of the commissioned corps of the NOAA and the United States public health service; expands access to benefits and assistance to those who served in the commissioned corps of the NOAA and the United States public health service.
LawCode: Amd §§350, 364, 369-b & 369-h, Exec L; amd §210, Ec Dev L; amd §63, Pub Off L; amd §§458, 458-a & 458-b, RPT L; amd §243, Mil L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the economic development law, the public officers law, the real property tax law and the military law, in relation to expanding the definition of veteran to include members of the commissioned corps of the national oceanic and atmospheric administration and the United States public health service
